name: Fluffy Shield
desc:
When activated, equips to the player and becomes a shield.
Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

name: Cat Helper
desc: While in team, Cattiva helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

name: Egg Layer
desc: Sometimes lays an Egg when assigned to Ranch.

name: Lifmunk Recoil
desc: When activated, leaps into the player's head and uses a submachine gun to follows up player attacks.

name: Huggy Fire
desc: When activated, equips to the player and transforms into a flamethrower.

name: Surfing Slam
desc: When activated, Fuack body surfs towards an enemy and slams into them.

name: Static Electricity
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Electric Pals.

name: Cheery Rifle
desc: When activated, Tanzee will mercilessly fire an assault rifle at nearby enemies.

name: Tiny Spark
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Fire Pals.

name: Pengullet Cannon
desc: When activated, the player equips a Rocket Launcher and fires Pengullet as ammunition. Pengullet explodes on contact and is incapacitated.

name: Brave Sailor
desc: When fighting together, Fire Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Jolt Bomb
desc: When activated, equips Jolthog to the player's hand. When thrown at an enemy, causes an electrical explosion upon impact.

name: Logging Assistance
desc: While in team, improves efficiency of cutting trees.

name: Dig Here!
desc: Sometimes digs up items from the ground when assigned to Ranch.

name: Dark Knowledge
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Dark Pals.

name: Soothing Shower
desc: When activated, spouts mysterious water that soothes wounds and restores the player's HP.

name: Caffeine Inoculation
desc: When activated, Depresso drinks a massive amount of energy drinks, causing its movement speed to increase.

name: Fluffy Wool
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Neutral Pals. Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

name: Dream Chaser
desc: While in team, appears near the player. Follows up player attacks with magic bullets.

name: Hard Head
desc: Can be ridden. Increases efficiency of destroying boulders while mounted.

name: Kuudere
desc: When fighting together, applies Dark damage to the player's attacks.

name: Ore Detector
desc: When activated, generates subtle vibrations to detect nearby ore.

name: Fried Squid
desc:
While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider.
Can float for long periods of time while gliding.

name: Gold Digger
desc: Sometimes digs up Gold Coin when assigned to Ranch.

name: Zephyr Glider
desc:
While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider.
Allows you to move quickly for long periods of time while gliding with this Pal.

name: Direhowl Rider
desc:
Can be ridden.
Moves slightly faster than most mounts.

name: Eggbomb Launcher
desc: When activated, equips to the player and transforms into an egg launcher.

name: Helper Bunny
desc: While in team, appears nearby the player. Automatically picks up nearby items.

name: Milk Maker
desc: Sometimes produces Milk when assigned to ranch.

name: Princess Gaze
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Grass Pals.

name: Angry Shark
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Aqua Gun. While in team, increases player's attack power.

name: Flying Trapeze
desc: While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider. Carries the player up high while gliding.

name: Grenadier Panda
desc: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a grenade launcher while mounted.

name: Candy Pop
desc: Sometimes drops Cotton Candy when assigned to ranch.

name: Berry Picker
desc: Sometimes drops Red Berries from its back when assigned to Ranch.

name: Pacapaca Wool
desc:
Can be ridden.
Sometimes drops Wool when assigned to Ranch.

name: Guardian Of The Forest
desc:
Can be ridden.
Can perform a double jump while mounted.
Increases efficiency of cutting trees.

name: Travel Companion
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount.

name: Skilled Fingers
desc:
While in team, increases attack power of Neutral Pals.
While at base, increases work efficiency if working at Weapon Workbench.

name: Flameclaw Hunter
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Hellfire Claw.

name: Mysterious Scales
desc: When activated, attacks target enemy with Poison Fog.

name: Warm Body
desc: Can be ridden. Keeps the rider warm in cold environments.

name: Soil Improver
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Ground Pals.

name: Telepeck
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Phantom Peck.

name: Sixth Sense
desc: When activated, utilizes its sixth sense to detect nearby dungeons.

name: Claws Glistening In The Dark
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Jumping Claw.

name: Galeclaw Rider
desc: While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider. Allows you to fire a gun while gliding with this Pal.

name: Hawk Eye
desc: While fighting together, allows you to deal more damage to weak points.

name: Full-power Gorilla Mode
desc: When activated, unleashes a primal fury that increases Gorirat's attack power.

name: Worker Bee
desc:
Sometimes drops Honey when assigned to Ranch.
While in team, Elizabee's stats will be increased.

name: Queen Bee Command
desc: While fighting together, stats will increase the more Beegarde are in your team.

name: Plump Body
desc: Can be ridden. Enhances Neutral attacks while mounted.

name: Fluffy
desc: While in team, Sweepa's stats will be increased.

name: King Of Fluff
desc: While fighting together, stats will increase the more Swee are in your team.

name: Wriggling Weasel
desc:
Can be ridden.
Applies Dragon Dragon damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Swift Deity
desc: Can be ridden. Applies Electric damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Aurora Guide
desc: While in a team, increases attack power of Ice pals.

name: Red Hare
desc: Can be ridden. Applies Fire damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Cool Body
desc:
Can be ridden.
Keeps the rider cool in hot environments.

name: Jumping Force
desc: Can be ridden. Can double jump while mounted.

name: Clear Mind
desc: Can be ridden. Unaffected by the cold or heat while riding this Pal.

name: Lady Of Lightning
desc: While in team, appears near the player. Follows up player attacks with lightning bolts.

name: Antigravity
desc: While in team, Lunaris manipulates gravity, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

name: Fragrant Dragon
desc:
Can be ridden.
Enchances Grass attacks while mounted.

name: Swift Swimmer
desc:
Can be ridden to travel on water.
While mounted, prevents stamina depletion while moving over water.

name: Messenger Of Death
desc:
Can be ridden.
Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Drill Crusher
desc: When activated, performs Shell Spin, follows the player while spinning, and mines ores efficiently.

name: Ultrasonic Sensor
desc: When activated, uses ultrasonic waves to detect the location of nearby Pals.

name: Heart Drain
desc: While fighting together, grants the player and Lovander the life steal effect which absorbs some of the received damage and restores HP.

name: Magma Tears
desc: Sometimes produces Flame Organ when assigned to Ranch.

name: Aerial Marauder
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Increases damage player deals to enemy weak points while mounted.

name: Brandish Blade
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Iaigiri.

name: Thunderous
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Electric damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Flame Wing
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Fire damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Grimoire Collector
desc: While fighting together, Neutral Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Lord Fox
desc: When fighting together, applies Fire damage to the player's attacks.

name: Grassland Speedster
desc: When fighting together, increases player's movement speed and applies Grass damage to the player's attacks.

name: Purification Of Gaia
desc: While fighting together, Ground Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Silk Maker
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Blizzard Spike. Sometimes produces High Quality Cloth when assigned to Ranch.

name: Amicable Holy Dragon
desc:
Can be ridden as a flying mount.
 While fighting together, Dark Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Aqua Spout
desc: While in team, increases attack power of Water Pals.

name: Waterwing Dance
desc: Can be ridden to travel on water. Applies Water damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Dragon Hunter
desc: While fighting together, Dragon Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Hellflame Lion
desc: Can be ridden. While fighting together, Grass Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Hungry Missile
desc: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a missile launcher while mounted.

name: Overaffectionate
desc: Can be ridden. While in team, Broncherry helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

name: Blessing Of The Flower Spirit
desc: When activated, uses medicinal flowers to restore the player's HP.

name: Ore-loving Beast
desc: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of mining ores while mounted.

name: King Of Muscles
desc: Can be ridden. While in team, Kingpaca helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

name: Gaia Crusher
desc: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of cutting trees and mining ores while mounted.

name: Guardian Of The Snowy Mountain
desc: Can be ridden. While in team, Wumpo helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

name: Hard Armor
desc: When fighting together, increases player's defense and applies Fire damage to the player's attacks.

name: Wind And Clouds
desc: Can be ridden. Can double jump while mounted.

name: Life Steal
desc: While fighting together, grants the player and Felbat the life steal effect which absorbs some of the received damage and restores HP.

name: Sky Dragon's Affection
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Dragon attacks while mounted.

name: Magma Kaiser
desc: Can be ridden. Enchances Fire attacks while mounted.

name: Wings Of Death
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

name: Black Anklyosaur
desc: Can be ridden a flying mount. Increases damage dealt to ore while mounted.

name: Steel Scorpion
desc: When fighting together, increases the player's defense and Electric Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Guardian Of The Desert
desc: When fighting together, applies Ground damage to the player's attacks. Sometimes dodges attacks with a high speed sidestep while in a battle.

name: Stormbringer Sea Dragon
desc: Can be ridden to travel on water. While mounted, prevents stamina depletion while moving over water.

name: Wings Of Flame
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Fire attacks while mounted.

name: Yellow Tank
desc: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a minigun while mounted.

name: Harvest Goddess
desc: When activated, the queen's soothing graces greatly restore the player's HP.

name: Scorching Predator
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. While fighting together, Ice Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Ferocious Thunder Dragon
desc: While fighting together, Water Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Modified Dna
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Dark attacks while mounted.

name: Holy Knight Of The Firmament
desc: Can be ridden. Can triple jump while mounted.

name: Dark Knight Of The Abyss
desc: Can be ridden. Can double jump while mounted.

name: Ice Steed
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Changes the player's attack type to Ice and enhances Ice attacks while mounted.

name: Aerial Missile
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Can rapidly fire a missile launcher while mounted.

name: Cold Bomb
desc: When activated, equips Jolthog Cryst to the player's hand. When thrown at an enemy, causes an icy explosion upon impact.

name: Gold Digger
desc: Sometimes digs up Gold Coin when assigned to Ranch.

name: Angry Shark
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Spirit Fire. While in team, increases player's attack power.

name: Winter Trapeze
desc: While in team, can be summoned and used instead of a glider. Carries the player up high while gliding.

name: Plane Partner
desc: Can be ridden. Can rapidly fire a grenade launcher while mounted.

name: Guardian Of The Golden Forest
desc: Can be ridden. Can perform a double jump while mounted. Increases efficiency of cutting trees.

name: Darkclaw Hunter
desc: When activated, attacks targeted enemy with a powerful Hellfire Claw.

name: Sixth Sense
desc: When activated, utilizes its sixth sense to detect nearby dungeons.

desc: While fighting together, allows you to deal more damage to weak points.

desc: Can be ridden. Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

desc: Can be ridden. Enhances Electric attacks while mounted.

desc: Can be ridden.

desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Increases damage player deals to enemy weak points while mounted.

Can be ridden as a flying mount.
While fighting together, Fire Pals drop more items when defeated.

desc: Can be ridden. While fighting together, Neutral Pals drop more items when defeated.

name: Ice Crusher
desc: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of cutting trees and mining ores while mounted.

desc: Can be ridden. While in team, Wumpo Botan helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

desc: Can be ridden. Enhances Fire attacks while mounted.

name: Wings Of Water
desc: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Water attacks while mounted.

name: Goddess Of The Tranquil Light
desc: When activated, the queen's soothing graces greatly restore the player's HP.
